entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:16 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 08:16 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:16 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
